name: list_of_room_types
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool booking_com.
Tool description: Find all hotels, view prices, photos of the hotels, reviews. Find car rental deals. **Site:** booking.com **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters
API description: Returns data related to room types from the Booking.com API. This function optionally takes a room type ID and an API key to fetch specific room type details.

room_type_id.description: The ID of the room type to be retrieved. Defaults to None.
